 0.86135312      20.0000002
 0.861353115     19.9999999
 0.86135312      20.0000002
Infinite loop detected in line 220

10 (0) REM SOLVE 25^X + 5^X = 20
20 FNF(.) (0) DEF FNF(X) = 25 ^ X + 5 ^ X
100 (1) LET L = 0
110 (1) LET U = 1
120 (1) PRINT "X", "VALUE"
200 (29) LET M = (L + U) / 2
210 (29) LET M1 = FNF(M)
220 (28) PRINT M, M1
230 (28) IF M1 = 20 THEN 500
240 (28) IF M1 < 20 THEN 400
300 (0) REM TOO HIGH... MOVE TO LOWER HALF
310 (16) LET U = M
320 (16) GOTO 200
400 (0) REM TOO LOW... MOVE TO UPPER HALF
410 (12) LET L = M
420 (12) GOTO 200
500 (0) PRINT "SOLVED FOR X:"; M
999 (0) END
